title: Make Do dictionary forms enabled by default
message:
Make Do dictionary forms enabled by default

This was accidentally disabled

title: Add option to search on keypress, without hitting search button
message: Add option to search on keypress, without hitting search button

title: Have Words clean up its data directory at startup time.
message:
Have Words clean up its data directory at startup time.

Files are stored under cache/<version code>/ now, so all files will
be updated when a new version is installed. Any old directories
under cache will be deleted at that time - e.g. version n + 1 will
delete version n's cached directory.

 * Some logging has been added that will display deletion status.
 * There's also some logging that will print if the words subprocess fails.
 * There's also some code to delete any data that is leftover from
   version 1.1 under the files directory.
 * Bumped the version number up to 8/1.2 in preparation for a new
   version on Google Play

title: Move the location of the words executable and support files from the
message:
Move the location of the words executable and support files from the
data directory to the cache directory. This means it won't get backed-up
automatically each night.

Run bmgr backupnow --all to see how much data it currently uploads -
it's a lot!

Also did some cursory code cleanups.
 * Strengthened visibility of many functions
 * Properly closed Input/Output streams in case of failures
 * Avoiding copying files that have already been copied
